simple_nonunique.title: Simple (non-unique)

simple_unique_ui.description: Array of strings without schema uniqueItems; UI sets options.uniqueItems to enforce uniqueness.

simple_placeholder.title: Simple string array with placeholder
simple_placeholder.description: A simple array of strings with a placeholder.

simple_required.title: Required with min/max items
simple_required.description: Required array with min/max items and unique items.

readonly.description: Readonly array of strings; UI schema sets 'readonly': true.
